com.rjrudin.marklogic.mgmt

Interface ResourceManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractResourceManager, AmpManager, CertificateTemplateManager, ConfigManager, DatabaseManager, ExternalSecurityManager, ForestManager, GroupManager, PrivilegeManager, ProtectedCollectionsManager, RoleManager, ServerManager, TargetManager, TaskManager, UserManager, ViewManager, ViewSchemaManager

    public interface ResourceManager
    Interface that AbstractResourceCommand is bound to. If you can implement this - most likely by subclassing AbstractResourceManager - then you should be able to subclass AbstractResourceCommand in order to very easily implement a new command.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean delete(java.lang.String payload)
      Assumes that a resource ID field is in the payload, and then extracts that field value and tries to delete a resource with the ID field value.
      boolean deleteByIdField(java.lang.String resourceIdFieldValue)
      Deletes a resource with the given resource ID field value.
      boolean exists(java.lang.String resourceNameOrId) 
      ResourcesFragment getAsXml() 
      Fragment getAsXml(java.lang.String resourceNameOrId) 
      Fragment getPropertiesAsXml(java.lang.String resourceNameOrId) 
      SaveReceipt save(java.lang.String payload)
      If a resource with a name in the the given payload exists, then update that resource; else create it.

      • delete

        boolean delete(java.lang.String payload)
        Assumes that a resource ID field is in the payload, and then extracts that field value and tries to delete a resource with the ID field value.
        Parameters:
        payload - a JSON or XML payload with the resource ID field in it
        Returns:
        true if a resource was deleted; false otherwise
